title: Vocabulary for Given Values
question_text:
In order to improve their marketing strategy, the manufacturer of a multi-vitamin for women wants to know the proportion of adult women who take a multi-vitamin daily. They survey a random sample of $520\text{ adult women}$ of which $250$ report that they do take a multi-vitamin daily.
Which of the following correctly describes the value obtained from this sample?

choices.text: $0.481$ is a statistic that represents the true proportion of adult women who take a multi-vitamin daily.
0.481 is a statistic that represents the proportion of adult women in this sample who take a multi-vitamin daily.
0.481 is a parameter that represents the proportion of adult women in this sample who take a multi-vitamin daily.
0.481 is a parameter that represents the true proportion of adult women who take a multi-vitamin daily.

250
is a statistic that represents the true number of adult women in every sample of size n=520
who would say that they take a multi-vitamin daily.
